  4. Place 3

Place 3

Ryan Reagan is serving his first term on the Benbrook City Council after being elected in 2025. A Cleburne native, he has lived in the Fort Worth area since 2007. In 2020, he and his wife, Lamyoung (Noy), moved their family to the Mary’s Creek area of Benbrook, drawn by the city’s small-town charm, great neighborhoods, and the greenbelts and creeks that make Benbrook such a special place. As a parent, Ryan values that Benbrook remains a community where kids can ride their bikes, play outdoors, and know their neighbors.

With more than 25 years of experience, Ryan has built a distinguished career as a technology executive serving multiple sectors, including retail, workforce management, government, the Department of Defense, and media. He holds a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science from Howard Payne University.

Beyond his professional career, Ryan is active in ministry groups that support and enrich men, women, and couples. He also enjoys cycling and exploring Benbrook’s parks, trails, and natural spaces.

.
